lead_paragraph: Rutgers Coach Greg Schiano released the recruit Reggie Dixon from a letter of intent yesterday. Rutgers did not explain the action, but ESPN reported that Dixon, a football and track star at Plainfield (N.J.) High School, had been found guilty in a juvenile court case last summer. Dixon’s father, Craig Venson, refused to allow his son to speak to a reporter, saying “All I can tell you is it’s in the hands of the Union County prosecutor and the case is under appeal.”.
